name: Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar is a famous beach destination in Bangladesh, known for its long sandy beach and the world's longest natural sea beach.

name: Sundarban
description: The Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is home to the Bengal tiger and diverse wildlife.

name: Dhaka
description: Dhaka is the capital and largest city of Bangladesh, offering a mix of historical landmarks, modern architecture, and vibrant markets.

name: Srimangal
description: Known as the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh,' Srimangal is famous for its tea gardens, lush green landscapes, and diverse wildlife.

name: Rangamati
description: Rangamati is a picturesque hill district with stunning landscapes, lakes, and indigenous communities. It is a perfect destination for nature lovers.
